thread.title: Future & Bow Wow On Sideline At Falcons-Seahawks Game
thread.title_full: Future & Bow Wow On Sideline At Falcons-Seahawks Game

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Future & Bow Wow On Sideline At Falcons-Seahawks Game
text:
Home > Entertainment > Future & Bow Wow On Sideline At Falcons-Seahawks Game Future & Bow Wow On Sideline At Falcons-Seahawks Game 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Jan 14, 2017 at 05:30pm Future hopes to see the Falcons win, and Russell Wilson lose. 
Future and Bow Wow have been spotted on the sideline of today's playoff game against the Atlanta Falcons and Seattle Seahawks. Future has made no secret of his distaste for Ciara 's husband, Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson; he threatened to "pull up" on Wilson in the song "Juice." 
The Falcons stadium DJ has vowed to play plenty of during the game ; Future's presence may also be a psychological tactic to get in Wilson's head. A petition has called for Future to perform at halftime. Instead, fans will enjoy a performance from Ludacris . Future is here, Falcons fans https://t.co/IxT7Wwrnrz pic.twitter.com/xIrqSO24wU — Ryan Cameron (@ryancameron) January 14, 2017 Bow Wow is here too with our pregame crew pic.twitter.com/I077nQQ9Jp — Wendy Adams (@wendyradio) January 14, 2017 This how the whole TL waiting to pull the trigger on Future slander if the Falcons lose. pic.twitter.com/jxRiuWG9xs < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Jan 14, 2017 at 05:30pm 0 Views 
"The Boy Meets World Tour" should be a big production. Future hopes to see the Falcons win, and Russell Wilson lose.
